all_text_timv: Khoury, Houtaf, 1967- http://id.loc.gov/authorities/names/no2012071807 Après un rêve : pour flute et piano / Houtaf Khoury. Copenhagen, Denmark : Edition Svitzer, 2015. 1 score (31 pages) + 1 part : portrait ; 30 cm notated music ntm rdacontent unmediated n rdamedia volume nc rdacarrier Includes biographical notes and program notes. "To Wissam Boustany"--Above caption title. This is an overwhelming dark piece, speaking without compromise of the disillusionment that comes after the euphoria of misplaced hopes and dreams, which is the story of Lebanon, the Middle East and beyond enduring so much injustice and violence - with no end in sight. Music and war Lebanon. Flute and piano music Scores and parts. http://id.loc.gov/authorities/subjects/sh2008103871 Flute and piano music Scores and parts. fast (OCoLC)fst01905696 Music and war. fast (OCoLC)fst01030492 Lebanon. fast (OCoLC)fst01206063
